definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: A person's gross income is the money they earn before tax is deducted from it.
sentences.chinese: 一個人的毛收入就是他在扣稅之前賺的錢。

sentences.english: They'll want to know your gross income.
sentences.chinese: 他們會想知道你的毛收入。

sentences.english: In his first year in practice his gross income was over a million in income.
sentences.chinese: 第一年裏，他的毛收入超過了一百萬。

sentences.english: A person or corporation's gross earnings before taxes are deducted.
sentences.chinese: 個人或公司扣稅前的毛收入。

definition: Chinese unit of weight equal to 0.5 kg
